abstract: White House Memo; Pres Obama's hammering of Congress on his proposed $447 billion jobs bill could exhaust patience of voters who saw him as alternative to partisanship.
snippet: The president’s hammering of Congress on his jobs bill could exhaust the patience of voters who saw him as an alternative to partisanship.
lead_paragraph: The president’s hammering of Congress on his jobs bill could exhaust the patience of voters who saw him as an alternative to partisanship.

headline.main: Some Risks as Obama Confronts Congress
headline.print_headline: Some Risks As Obama Confronts Congress
headline.seo: Some Risks as Obama Confronts Congress
